dmca.title: [ABUSE] Abuse Complaint]
dmca.body:
nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Saturday, April 02, 2005 1:44 PM
To: Copyright Compliance
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Abuse Complaint]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

For your review.
- --
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html

- -------- Original Message --------
From: - Sat Apr 02 13:39:29 2005
X-Mozilla-Status: 0001
X-Mozilla-Status2: 00000000
Received: from [172.16.214.180] (helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com)        by
mail.theplanet.com with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256)        (Exim
4.50)        id 1DGiLr-0002bO-3b        for abuseadm@theplanet.com; Wed, 30 Mar 2005
12:55:39 -0600
Received: from spooling.theplanet.com ([69.56.141.4]
helo=lili.theplanet.com)        by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from
abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com)        with smtp (Exim)        id
1DGiLn-00066V-0i
for abuseadm@theplanet.com; Wed, 30 Mar 2005 12:55:38 -0600
Received: (qmail 13331 invoked from network); 30 Mar 2005 18:55:34 -0000
Received: from unknown (HELO ?216.185.111.52?) (172.16.214.110)  by
lili.theplanet.com with SMTP; 30 Mar 2005 18:55:34 -0000
Received: from [172.16.214.181] (helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com)        by
mail.theplanet.com with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256)        (Exim
4.50) id 1DGiLl-0002ao-2D        for abuse@theplanet.com; Wed, 30 Mar 2005
12:55:33 -0600
Received: from bay101-f9.bay101.hotmail.com ([64.4.56.19]
helo=hotmail.com)        by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from
kwal5@hotmail.com)        with esmtp (Exim) id 1DGiLh-000FTv-0i        for
abuse@theplanet.com; Wed, 30 Mar 2005 12:55:32 -0600
Received: from mail pickup service by hotmail.com with Microsoft
SMTPSVC;        Wed, 30 Mar 2005 10:55:28 -0800
Message-ID: <BAY101-F9146C9FEB971F650BB91AEB460@phx.gbl>
Received: from 64.4.56.207 by by101fd.bay101.hotmail.msn.com with HTTP; Wed,
30 Mar 2005 18:55:28 GMT
X-Originating-IP: [64.4.56.207]
X-Originating-Email: [kwal5@hotmail.com]
X-Sender: kwal5@hotmail.com
From: Shawn Pearce <kwal5@hotmail.com>
To: abuse@theplanet.com
Date: Wed, 30 Mar 2005 13:55:28 -0500
Mime-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; format=flowed
X-OriginalArrivalTime: 30 Mar 2005 18:55:28.0227 (UTC)
FILETIME=[0A12F330:01C5355A]
Received-SPF: pass (mx02.filter.theplanet.com: domain of hotmail.com
designates 64.4.56.19 as permitted sender) client-ip=64.4.56.19;
envelope-from=kwal5@hotmail.com; helo=hotmail.com;
X-Spam-Level: ---------------------------------------------------
X-Spam-Score: -99.7
Cc: chibiusa@sayuri.ca
Subject: [ABUSE] Abuse Complaint
X-BeenThere: abuse@lists.theplanet.com
X-Mailman-Version: 2.1.5
Precedence: list
List-Id: abuse.lists.theplanet.com
List-Unsubscribe: <http://lists.theplanet.com/mailman/listinfo/abuse>,
<mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=unsubscribe>
List-Post: <mailto:abuse@lists.theplanet.com>
List-Help: <mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=help>
List-Subscribe: <http://lists.theplanet.com/mailman/listinfo/abuse>,
<mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=subscribe>
Sender: abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
Errors-To: abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
X-Spam-Level: ---------------------------------------------------
X-Spam-Score: -99.7

I am emailing in reguards to the website http://www.spheritic.net/ which is
hosted through your services through the IP address 70.84.53.250.

This site contains copyrighted material that was pulled from my personnal
website, or specifically
http://www.spheritic.net/images/wingsofhope/Databits.png.

They also defame me and some other people I know in an online blog contained
on their site, http://www.spheritic.net/content.php?article.23.

I view this as an abusive act. I request that either A) the abusive
information is removed, or B) the hosted site be closed down. As this
clearly violates your own Acceptable Use Policy defined on your site at
http://theplanet.com/legal/aup.html.

I also view this a a violation of copyright, as they did not recieve any
written concent on my part to use that image taken from my site (which is
explicitly stated as a requirement in the copyright notice on the footer of
every page on my site). Thus I also request any information I may need to
take any legal actions necisarry in this situation.


Thank you for your time,

Shawn Pearce of Databits Software
http://www.databits.cc/




- --
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

iD8DBQFCTvYLvK/XpJs6oyURAtG6AKCBweYbuNinm7WwUCjBjwoHO0vOwwCgrKUc
uspVnQXYQYBb7vahhYfrBBk=
=c10o
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
